Resulthandler that writes the transformed record to a file.

Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
outputDirectory	text	-
Directory in which the resultfile must be stored
move2dirAfterFinalize	text	-
Directory to which the created file must be moved after finalization (is optional)
filenamePattern	text	-
Name of the file is created using the messageformat. Params: 1=inputfilename,
